# Quicksilver Live Peers
Here is a list of active peers. Add them to your `config.toml` if you have trouble finding peers.

Here is a script for you to update `persistent_peers` setting with these peers in `config.toml`.

```
PEERS=bcbc620d23148bc8c42bfb21fc8bd6d1e779d83f@3.250.182.57:26656,74ee84e4c227de22d953276df04f2840802290c5@146.190.35.183:30629,cb6ae22e1e89d029c55f2cb400b0caa19cbe5523@15.222.128.8:26603,03f8f542594292401d2378cc8dffb8ec92ab9b07@74.96.207.60:26656,271419d3eb3878c902ebb0064490ad702d9d067f@144.76.145.150:26656,0183f174dbee92a7f0a6976288dbfc34793439f3@64.20.35.34:21026,ae353518e6009eb48d80ccf6a006a9644e9dd309@146.19.24.101:26656,e0604aa63b2b483bdb7f3ffba80a91803080bff8@62.171.183.214:26656,da0fe9142321b1483135775a30034519b5d5cd6a@185.100.232.77:20026,6f7f00cc445627c68435d0c27394afab5fb41919@65.21.200.224:11156,e43ef756309cf5dfbe4cbe17137c7e137d5605f9@95.217.197.100:26654,9bab3f1a766f00a80256593fb6e94339fadfa5e5@65.108.125.236:26616,808ea37bf4c3b554f8f55b13c00c40ff55046cf9@95.217.225.212:36656,a1f5e0b68f36091d5fc8f30aba914b6c191f21fa@65.108.128.201:11156,bba10290da32f3cb41e15c3a192413666ce05cee@136.243.119.242:26656,471518432477e31ea348af246c0b54095d41352c@78.47.210.210:26656,c2a93286be0b20345d5b9909c748b24e0edf54a4@178.170.40.28:15620,0307e98cceb81b5f075ee69f53c0032940dea98c@65.108.43.113:26656,8cb758d83f6eeb360429bbdb8559943a39df6067@141.94.193.12:15656,8e4e1f1e087c76c71c64e477e95495833da82aa2@135.181.173.138:26656
sed -i.bak -e "s/^persistent_peers *=.*/persistent_peers = \"$PEERS\"/" $HOME/.quicksilverd/config/config.toml
```
